data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Aran who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aran, Azerbaijan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Aran, Azerbaijan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Aran, Azerbaijan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, let it be said of the 60,841 lost in Aran that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Aran, Azerbaijan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kurd, Kurmanji people.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Aran, Azerbaijan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 60,841 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Aran, Azerbaijan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aran, Azerbaijan has a population of 61,000.

We estimate Aran has 159 people who might know Jesus, 1,767 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 59,074 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 383 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Aran. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
